title: Industry responds to Chancellor’s new Budget
lead: Rishi Sunak has opened his red box – but what does the energy industry think?

title: Texas power co-op files for bankruptcy after $2.1bn electricity bill
lead: Brazos Electric Power Cooperative serves 16 distribution member co-ops that cater to more than 1.5 million Texans

title: Volvo goes all-electric by 2030
lead: The automotive manufacturer has pledged to phase out the production of all models with internal combustion engines

title: Budget 2021: ‘New infrastructure bank to drive at least £40bn of green investment’
lead: Chancellor of the Exchequer Rishi Sunak said ‘a real commitment to green growth’ is needed to build a strong, fair and resilient future economy

title: UN publishes guidance for financial institutions to invest in ocean health
lead: Banks, insurers and investors have a ‘major role’ to play in financing the transition towards a sustainable blue economy, helping to rebuild ocean prosperity and restore biodiversity to the ocean

title: Rolls-Royce and Fermi Energia team up for compact nuclear power stations
lead: The study of small modular reactors will cover all aspects of deployment, including grid suitability, cooling, emergency planning, human resources, licensing feasibility, economics and supply chain

title: Energy Institute CEO Louise Kingham to join bp as UK country head
lead: She will join the company in May, bringing a wealth of knowledge and experience across a broad range of issues within the energy industry

title: UK to launch Interim Office for Environmental Protection
lead: The new Office will be set up from July in non-statutory form to provide independent oversight of the government’s environmental progress and to accelerate the foundation of the full body

title: Airborne drones ‘could soon discover ideal spots for tidal energy projects’
lead: Current methods for assessing tidal streams depend on survey vessels or special sensors installed at the seabed, approaches that can be time-consuming and expensive

title: Changeable weather sees volatile energy prices while LNG steps into the breach…
lead: Changeable weather sees volatile energy prices while LNG steps into the breach…
